lines.text: How do you know the future you've got now is the same future you're going to have if something in the past is different from the last time you went back to the future?
My wives exist in different temporal aspects of a four-dimensional space-time continuum.
You're hyperventilating, Gary. Put your head between your knees.
What, so I can kiss my arse goodbye?
You don't want to listen to my problems.
